Package battleship

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BattleShip
    This class is our main class
    ErrorFrame
    This class is a JFrame, which shows up when an error occurs
    GameOverFrame
    This class is a JFrame, which shows up, when the game is over
    HelpFrame
    This class is a JFrame, that shows up when the help button is clicked
    PcBoardPane
    This class is a JPanel, which represents the board of the PC
    PlayersDetailsFrame
    This class is a JFrame, which shows up when the game is opened and the player must insert his name
    PlayGameFrame
    This class is a JFrame, which shows up, when the player has placed all of his ships on board and is ready to play
    ShipsPlacementFrame
    This class is a JFrame, where the player places his ships on his board
    ShipsToBePlacedPane
    This class is a JPanel, where the ships that the player can place on board are
    YourBoardPane
    This class is a JPanel, where the player's board is
    YourGameBoardPane
    This class is a JPanel, where the player's board with a title is placed
